A fantastic update to CS 1.6, everything that Source wasn't. It's managed to balance the maps, weapons, and economy to perfection. Truly a perfect game for esports. What a shame about the toxic community! (But you'll happen across friendly folks to queue up with.)
This game is so much fun and it is so classic. Most of the times, I just cannot resist its temptation... hah.
Fun game, but takes LOTS of practice

kinda good game. hackers bad, vac bad, smurfs bad, matchmaking bad, gameplay good, community sometimes good, esports scene good, maps good, skillceiling so fucking high it's ridiculous (but that's a good thing). overall enjoyable game despite being super fucking awful for new players as of now. I still recommend if you wanna grind.
